name: ShouldIWatertheGrass
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: should i water the grass
des:
Uses the predicted rainfall amount, current maximum temperature over the next few days, and the current time to answer the question 'Should I water the grass'. 

Most grass is happy with 2 inches of water every few days and doesn't need to be watered every day, especially if there will be a decent amount of rainfall. It's also better to water the grass earlier in the morning to help save on water, and make sure the grass gets
